channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Exploring Text-to-Image capabilities in .NET】在.NET中探索文本对图像功能
item.description: 【I created my first graphic in 1981 using a language called "BASIC" on a computer by Texas Instruments called the TI-99/4A. The code to enter and run BASIC, by the way, was written by a new company at the time named Microsoft. In July of 1991, a program called "POV-Ray" was released that made it possible to render complex 3D scenes using a doma】我在1981年创建了我的第一张图形，该语言在德州仪器的计算机上使用了一种名为TI-99/4A的计算机上的语言。顺便说一句，要输入和运行基本的代码是由一家名为Microsoft的新公司编写的。 1991年7月，发布了一个名为“ POV射线”的程序，该计划使使用DOMA渲染复杂的3D场景成为可能

item.title: 【Visual Studio 2026 Insiders: Using Podman for Container Development】Visual Studio 2026内部人员：使用Podman进行容器开发
item.description: 【Podman is an open-source container engine that has rapidly gained popularity for its daemonless architecture, rootless operation, and compatibility with Docker CLI commands. Unlike Docker, Podman does not require a central daemon, offering improved security and flexibili】Podman是一款开源容器引擎，其无根的架构，无根操作以及与Docker CLI命令的兼容性迅速获得了知名度。与Docker不同，Podman不需要中央守护程序，提供了提高的安全性和Flexibili

item.title: 【Why is Windows still tinkering with critical sections?】为什么Windows仍在修补关键部分？
item.description: 【Adrian aka Silent aka CookiePLMonster did a deep investigation into how a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in W】阿德里安（Adrian）又名Silent Aka Cookieplmonster对GTA San Andreas的20岁虫在W中进行了深入的调查。

item.title: 【Teaching the LLM Good Habits: How Azure MCP Uses Best-Practice Tools】教LLM良好习惯：Azure MCP如何使用最佳实践工具
【Foundry Local Meets More Silicon】铸造本地遇到更多硅
item.description: 【Foundry Local is a high-performance local AI runtime stack that brings Azure AI Foundry’s power to client devices. Foundry Local lets you build and ship cross-platform AI apps that run models with acceleration on a wide range of hardware. The Evolution of AI Acceleration On-device AI has progressed】Foundry Local是一种高性能的本地AI运行时堆栈，它将Azure AI Foundry的功率带给客户设备。 Foundry Local可以允许您构建和运送跨平台AI应用程序，该应用程序在各种硬件上以加速度运行模型。人工智能加速度的进化已进步已进展

item.title: 【Another lesson learned from the Windows 98 on-stage USB blue screen】从Windows 98舞台上USB蓝屏中学到的另一个教训
item.description: 【Microsoft Production Studios (commonly known inside Microsoft simply as Microsoft Studios) is a large broadcast studio nestled in the trees on Microsoft's main Redmond Campus.¹ Here's a video hosted by Luke Burbank, local】Microsoft Production Studios（通常在Microsoft内部简单地称为Microsoft Studios）是一个大型广播工作室，坐落在Microsoft Main Redmond Campus的树木中。

item.title: 【Enhancements to XAML Live Preview in Visual Studio for .NET MAUI】为.NET MAUI的Visual Studio中XAML Live Preview的增强功能
item.description: 【The XAML Live Preview feature in Visual Studio 2022 version 17.14 introduces a significant usability improvement for .NET MAUI projects: the XAML Live Preview window is now available during design time, eliminating the requirement to initiate a debug session. This change streamlines the UI dev】Visual Studio 2022版本17.14中的XAML Live Preview功能引入了.NET MAUI项目的可用性改进：XAML Live Preview窗口现已在设计期间可用，消除了启动调试会话的要求。此更改简化了UI DEV

item.title: 【Using the new SqlVector type with EF Core and Dapper】将新的SQLVector类型与EF Core和Dapper一起使用
item.description: 【Azure SQL vector support has been generally available for a few months now, and the ecosystem is quickly evolving to make working with vectors in your applications as seamless and efficient as possible. With the release of】Azure SQL向量支持通常已经有几个月了，并且生态系统正在迅速发展，以使应用程序中的向量尽可能无缝有效。随着发布

item.title: 【New Trusted Publishing enhances security on NuGet.org】新的Trusted Publishing在Nuget.org上增强了安全性
item.description: 【We’re excited to announce Trusted Publishing on nuget.org — a simpler, safer way to publish NuGet packages from GitHub Actions. Rather than relying on long‑lived API keys, your workflow can use a short‑lived GitHub OIDC token to request a temporary, single‑use NuGet API key. These keys expire quickly (≈ 1 hour), eliminating long‑】我们很高兴能在Nuget.org上宣布可信赖的发布 - 一种更简单，更安全的方式，可以从GitHub Actions发布Nuget软件包。您的工作流不再依靠长期的API键，而是可以使用短寿命的github oidc令牌来请求临时的一次性nuget api键。这些钥匙迅速到期（≈1小时），消除了长期的

item.title: 【Why was Windows 3.0's WinHelp called an online help system when it ran offline?】为什么Windows 3.0的Winhelp在离线运行时称其为在线帮助系统？
item.description: 【Some time ago, I described Windows 3.0's WinHelp as "a program for browsing online help files." But Windows 3.0 predated the Internet, and these help files were available even if the computer was not】不久前，我将Windows 3.0的Winhelp描述为“用于浏览在线帮助文​​件的程序”。但是Windows 3.0早于Internet，即使计算机不是计算机也可以使用这些帮助文件
